name: Javier's Assistant
description:
Can you POSSIBLY Manage your new job as

The Dictionary defines "Out of Control" as No Longer To Possible to Manage....

and from what you've heard about your new boss Javier, you may wonder if you can possibly manage what comes next!

========================================================

CAN YOU KEEP UP WITH THE CHAOS!!!

Step into the mad world of Javier, a strong willed VP in dire need of some great help. Take the role of his personal assistant and help him manage the day to day hustle and bustle of professional life.

There's a lot going on and things may get a little out of control if you're not careful. Do your best to fulfill Javier's every request, despite the chaos and noise, and ensure that you receive a spectacular evaluation!

This game was our 2 person team's entry to the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. It was built using the Unity Game Engine in less than 48hrs. Thanks to our wonderful wives for their support!

Controls:
Mouse (Clicks)

MAKE SURE TO POST SCREENSHOTS OF YOUR HIGH SCORES IN THE COMMENTS! WE DOUBT ANYONE WILL GET OVER 500,000!
